channel.title: Portal 2 The National Video Contest
channel.description:
Remember that Exile Vilify contest back in July?
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M6u3z45ZpRQ]My entry.[/url]
It's not very good and all, but that's not why I'm posting it. I just want to see if anyone here would see what I actually had in mind when making this video.
If not, then it's really not as obvious as I thought it was.

item.title: Portal 2 The National Video Contest
item.dc:creator: Ixy
item.description:
Nope. I’m a terrible actor.

It’s better when I’m behind the camera. Or nowhere near it.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 The National Video Contest
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
It’s a really nice video in my standard, is that guy you?

item.title: Portal 2 The National Video Contest
item.dc:creator: Ixy
item.description:
Yeah, nobody gives a shit. Figures.

Anyway, there was a mini ARG. But I don’t think anyone figured that out.

Read full topic
